titleStmt.title: Here begy[n]neth y[e] new notborune mayd vpo[n] y[e] passio[n] of Cryste

publicationStmt.publisher: By John Skot dwellyuge [sic] in Foster Lane [w?]in Saynt Leonardes parysshe,

notesStmt.note: Date of imprint suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
A religious parody of The nutbrown maid--Cf. Hazlitt. Handbook, p. 425.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
